summary: The diff implements backend and frontend infrastructure for handling rate breakdowns (base fare, taxes, service fees) across the application. The implementation covers REQ-1 (backend storage), REQ-2 (search results display with fare breakdown), and REQ-3 (admin table display with rate breakdown). All three requirements appear to be addressed with appropriate data structures, UI components, and fare calculation logic.

hallucinated_features.reason: Migration infrastructure was not requested in the BuildRequest. The request focused only on displaying Red Bus routes with fare breakdowns, not on data migration or schema evolution.

hallucinated_features.description: Compare routes functionality with checkbox selection
hallucinated_features.reason: Route comparison feature with multi-select checkboxes and comparison state management was not requested. The requirement only asked for displaying routes with fare information.
